channel.title: +Self cultivation on संस्कारे विश्वासटिप्पणयः
channel.description: Recent content in +Self cultivation on संस्कारे विश्वासटिप्पणयः

item.title: Hygene by P
item.description: Intro Title: Hindu (Brahminical) hygiene Author: preShThA of MH Time: Mar 2020 - Beginning of Wuhan epidemic in India. Items Wake up early in the morning before sun rises. By the arunodaya, you should have finished shaucham and out to bathe in bālārka. Women would be doing gomaya-parimarjana in courtyards, rangoli. Gomaya works wonders. Alas. Bathing for men was mostly out in the open, right next to the wells, with freshly drawn water.
